original_text: The Pharisees also heard about what had happened. They said, ‘This man can send bad spirits out of people only because Beelzebul gives him authority. That is Satan, the one who rules all the bad spirits.’
korean_text: 바리새인들은 듣고 이르되 이가 귀신의 왕 바알세불을 힘입지 않고는 귀신을 쫓아내지 못하느니라 하거늘

sentences.original_text: The Pharisees also heard about what had happened.
This man can send bad spirits out of people
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람은 사람들에게서 악한 영을 내쫓을 수 있다.

sentences.original_text: only because Beelzebul gives him authority.
sentences.korean_translation: 오직 바알세불이 그에게 권세를 주기 때문이다.

sentences.original_text: the one who rules all the bad spirits.
